name: Earth's Last Defense
description:
STORY

Dive into the role of being a Pilot that mission is to blast away every crumble of asteroids out in space to save the world.

Your mission is not only to destroy waves of  asteroids.  you're also the last space ship defender on earth to save not only the human kind but the whole world.

Be not only a Pilot be the Hero himself.

THE IDEA

After an hour of brainstomring about this years GameJam topic "joined together", we cam up with an innovative idea:

Let's built a 3D Space-Shooter where you have to defend the earth from incomming asteroids. Innovative isn't it? Jokes aside, the important element in our game is the built-in battery of the ship. The player has to connect himself to a space-station to charge up his battery to fire way on these incomming asteroids. We decided to make it a Third-Person-Shooter to give the player the real space feeling.

The players mission is surviving as many asteroid waves as possible while always watching for the next space station to get your energy refilled.

MOVEMENT

W/A/S/D to move.

Mouse to look around.

Left mousebutton to shoot.

Right mousebutton to use special ability.
